name: Hello Alice
description:
A musical choose your own Alice adventure. Created by Edwin DeNicholas (@edenicholas) for Alice Jam 150 - http://jams.gamejolt.io/alicejam150

Synopsis:

Choose your own Alice by moving to collect words.

Controls:

  • Move = WASD/Arrow Keys, Mouse, Left Stick
  • Press ESCAPE to exit.

Credits:

  • Programming, Art, and Music by Edwin DeNicholas
  • LED and Glitch effects from Colorful: By Thomas Hourdel https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/3842
  • Words from ALICE'S ADVENTURES IN WONDERLAND By Lewis Carroll https://www.gutenberg.org/files/11/11-h/11-h.htm

Version History:

  • V1.01 - Adjustment to brightness levels. Mac and Linux builds!
  • V1.0 - Initial Release
